thread.title: Dave Mustaine Reacts To Grammys 'Master Of Puppets' Gaffe [News]
thread.title_full: Dave Mustaine Reacts To Grammys 'Master Of Puppets' Gaffe [News]

title: Dave Mustaine Reacts To Grammys 'Master Of Puppets' Gaffe [News]
text:
Dave Mustaine Reacts to Grammys 'Master of Puppets' Gaffe Also, a wild Marty Friedman collaboration appears. UG News editor since early 2013. King Crimson fan. I handle the news around here. Posted 9 hours ago 36 
Dave Mustaine posted a brief comment to one today's hot topics of the metal community - the fact that "Master of Puppets" was played - poorly - when Megadeth was awarded the Best Metal Performance Grammy yesterday. 
Mr. Mustaine took the whole fiasco in his stride, tweeting: "Ah, you can't blame 'em for not being able to play Megadeth."The frontman received plenty of congrats via Twitter, including one from Marty Friedman, to which he replied: "Thanks Marty. You helped in a big way. So, Megadeth and the Marty Friedman project, play Budokan in Tokyo. Sound fun? Haha! Love ya bud."In case you missed it, you can watch the official footage from the show below.
